Title: Provides for alternative penalties for violations of certain provisions of the alcoholic beverage control law
Summary: Provides an alternative penalty for violations of certain provisions of the alcoholic beverage control law; decreases the civil penalty imposed from $10,000 to $5,000.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to providing for alternative penalties for violations of certain provisions of the alcoholic beverage control law
